comment.body: `sizeof(uint16_t)` could be replaced with `sizeof(msg1_len)` for clarity (also making it slightly easier to change the size of `msg1_len` in the future).

pull_request.title: Use 16-bit length fields in hybrid KEX format

repo.name: openssl
repo.description: Fork of OpenSSL that includes quantum-resistant algorithms and ciphersuites based on liboqs.
